occupation: Co-Founder/CDO and Former CEO at Versa Networks
headline: Co-Founder/CDO and Former CEO at Versa Networks
summary:
1. Proven track record of leading mega-projects at both startups and public companies.
2. Leadership of multiple blockbuster product lines that created new multi-billion dollar revenue streams.
3. Successful execution of Juniper’s flagship MX series, which established Juniper as leader in the metro Ethernet market.
4. Led the development of the MobileNext product family - Juniper Networks’ entry to Evolved Packet Core (EPC). Provided leadership in the design, development, and delivery of a truly differentiated and unmatched solution for EPC. 
5. Successfully built and managed very large global engineering teams
6. Focused and experienced in working directly with customers worldwide

Specialties:
Leadership, strategy, enterprise IT and service provider networking, Mobile Packet Core, cloud technologies, services

experiences.title: Co-Founder/CDO/Chief Soul Officer and Former CEO
experiences.description: Co-founded next generation networking startup to address core operational, business agility and cost reduction issues facing both service provider and enterprise customers.

experiences.title: VP Engineering
experiences.description:
- Delivered multiple blockbuster product lines that created new multi-billion dollar revenue streams like Juniper’s flagship MX series.
- Led the development of the MobileNext product family - Juniper Networks’ entry to Evolved Packet Core (EPC). Provided leadership of a truly differentiated and unmatched solution for EPC.
- Successfully built and managed very large global engineering teams.

education.school: Stanford University Graduate School of Business

accomplishment_patents.title: SERVER SELECTION DURING RETRANSMIT OF A REQUEST
